30 
41 PiercedSyncAction::PiercedSyncAction(ActionType _type)
42  : type(_type), data(nullptr)
43 {
44 }
45 
49 PiercedSyncAction::PiercedSyncAction(const PiercedSyncAction &other)
50 {
51  // Copy the items that need allocation
52  std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>> new_data;
53  if (other.data) {
54  new_data = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>>(new std::vector<std::size_t>(*(other.data)));
55  }
56 
57  // Assign the new memory to the object
58  type = other.type;
59 
60  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < INFO_COUNT; ++k) {
61  info[k] = other.info[k];
62  }
63 
64  data.swap(new_data);
65 }
66 
73 PiercedSyncAction & PiercedSyncAction::operator=(const PiercedSyncAction &other)
74 {
75  if (this != &other) {
76  PiercedSyncAction temporary(other);
77  temporary.swap(*this);
78  }
79 
80  return *this;
81 }
82 
88 void PiercedSyncAction::swap(PiercedSyncAction &other) noexcept
89 {
90  std::swap(type, other.type);
91  std::swap(info, other.info);
92  data.swap(other.data);
93 }
94 
100 void PiercedSyncAction::importData(const std::vector<std::size_t> &values)
101 {
102  data = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>>(new std::vector<std::size_t>(values));
103 }
104 
110 void PiercedSyncAction::restore(std::istream &stream)
111 {
112  int actionType;
113  utils::binary::read(stream, actionType);
114  type = static_cast<ActionType>(actionType);
115 
116  for (int k = 0; k < INFO_COUNT; ++k) {
117  utils::binary::read(stream, info[k]);
118  }
119 
120  std::size_t dataSize;
121  utils::binary::read(stream, dataSize);
122  data = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>>(new std::vector<std::size_t>(dataSize));
123  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < dataSize; ++k) {
124  utils::binary::read(stream, (*data)[k]);
125  }
126 }
127 
133 void PiercedSyncAction::dump(std::ostream &stream) const
134 {
135  utils::binary::write(stream, static_cast<int>(type));
136 
137  for (int k = 0; k < INFO_COUNT; ++k) {
138  utils::binary::write(stream, info[k]);
139  }
140 
141  std::size_t dataSize = data->size();
142  utils::binary::write(stream, dataSize);
143  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < dataSize; ++k) {
144  utils::binary::write(stream, (*data)[k]);
145  }
146 }

159 PiercedSyncSlave::PiercedSyncSlave()
160 {
161 }
162 
175 void PiercedSyncSlave::swap(PiercedSyncSlave &x) noexcept
176 {
177  BITPIT_UNUSED(x);
178 }
179 
191 PiercedSyncMaster::PiercedSyncMaster()
192  : m_syncEnabled(false)
193 {
194  for (int k = SYNC_MODE_ITR_BEGIN; k != SYNC_MODE_ITR_END; ++k) {
195  SyncMode mode = static_cast<SyncMode>(k);
196  m_syncGroups[mode] = SyncGroup();
197  }
198 }
199 
212 void PiercedSyncMaster::swap(PiercedSyncMaster &x) noexcept
213 {
214  std::swap(x.m_slaves, m_slaves);
215  std::swap(x.m_syncGroups, m_syncGroups);
216  std::swap(x.m_syncJournal, m_syncJournal);
217 }
218 
225 void PiercedSyncMaster::registerSlave(PiercedSyncSlave *slave, SyncMode syncMode)
226 {
227  if (m_slaves.count(slave) > 0) {
228  throw std::out_of_range("Slave is already registered");
229  }
230 
231  // Register the slave
232  m_slaves.insert({slave, syncMode});
233 
234  // Add the slave to the proper synchronization group
235  SyncGroup &syncGroup = m_syncGroups.at(syncMode);
236  syncGroup.push_back(slave);
237 
238  // If needed enable synchronization
239  if (!isSyncEnabled() && syncMode != SYNC_MODE_DISABLED) {
240  setSyncEnabled(true);
241  }
242 }
243 
249 void PiercedSyncMaster::processSyncAction(const PiercedSyncAction &action)
250 {
251  if (!isSyncEnabled()) {
252  return;
253  }
254 
255  // Synchronize concurrent slaves
256  for (PiercedSyncSlave *slave : m_syncGroups.at(PiercedSyncMaster::SYNC_MODE_CONCURRENT)) {
257  commitSyncAction(slave, action);
258  }
259 
260  // If there are journaled slaves the synchronization action needs to be
261  // journaled
262  if (m_syncGroups.at(PiercedSyncMaster::SYNC_MODE_JOURNALED).size() > 0) {
263  journalSyncAction(action);
264  }
265 }
266 
273 void PiercedSyncMaster::commitSyncAction(PiercedSyncSlave *slave, const PiercedSyncAction &action)
274 {
275  slave->commitSyncAction(action);
276 }
277 
283 void PiercedSyncMaster::journalSyncAction(const PiercedSyncAction &action)
284 {
285  switch (action.type) {
286 
287  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_CLEAR:
288  m_syncJournal.resize(1);
289  m_syncJournal[0] = action;
290  break;
291 
292  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_NOOP:
293  break;
294 
295  default:
296  m_syncJournal.push_back(action);
297  break;
298 
299  }
300 }
301 
307 void PiercedSyncMaster::unregisterSlave(const PiercedSyncSlave *slave)
308 {
309  // Check if the slave was actually registered
310  if (!isSlaveRegistered(slave)) {
311  return;
312  }
313 
314  // Remove the slave from the synchronization group
315  SyncMode syncMode = getSlaveSyncMode(slave);
316  SyncGroup &syncGroup = m_syncGroups.at(syncMode);
317  for (auto itr = syncGroup.begin(); itr != syncGroup.end(); ++itr) {
318  PiercedSyncSlave *item = *itr;
319  if (item == slave) {
320  syncGroup.erase(itr);
321  break;
322  }
323  }
324 
325  // Unregister the slave
326  m_slaves.erase(const_cast<PiercedSyncSlave *>(slave));
327 }
328 
334 bool PiercedSyncMaster::isSlaveRegistered(const PiercedSyncSlave *slave) const
335 {
336  return (m_slaves.count(const_cast<PiercedSyncSlave *>(slave)) > 0);
337 }
338 
345 PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode PiercedSyncMaster::getSlaveSyncMode(const PiercedSyncSlave *slave) const
346 {
347  return m_slaves.at(const_cast<PiercedSyncSlave *>(slave));
348 }
349 
359 bool PiercedSyncMaster::isSlaveSynced(const PiercedSyncSlave *slave) const
360 {
361  SyncMode syncMode = getSlaveSyncMode(slave);
362  if (syncMode == SYNC_MODE_CONCURRENT) {
363  return true;
364  } else if (syncMode == SYNC_MODE_JOURNALED) {
365  return m_syncJournal.empty();
366  } else {
367  return false;
368  }
369 }
370 
374 void PiercedSyncMaster::sync()
375 {
376  // Only journaled slaved need to be synchronized
377  for (PiercedSyncSlave *slave : m_syncGroups.at(SYNC_MODE_JOURNALED)) {
378  for (const PiercedSyncAction &action : m_syncJournal) {
379  commitSyncAction(slave, action);
380  }
381  }
382 
383  // Clear the sync journal
384  m_syncJournal.clear();
385  m_syncJournal.shrink_to_fit();
386 }
387 
393 bool PiercedSyncMaster::isSynced() const
394 {
395  for (const PiercedSyncSlave *slave : m_syncGroups.at(SYNC_MODE_JOURNALED)) {
396  if (!isSlaveSynced(slave)) {
397  return false;
398  }
399  }
400 
401  return true;
402 }
403 
410 void PiercedSyncMaster::setSyncEnabled(bool enabled)
411 {
412  m_syncEnabled = enabled;
413 }
414 
421 bool PiercedSyncMaster::isSyncEnabled() const
422 {
423  return m_syncEnabled;
424 }
425 
431 void PiercedSyncMaster::restore(std::istream &stream)
432 {
433  std::size_t journalSize;
434  utils::binary::read(stream, journalSize);
435  m_syncJournal.resize(journalSize);
436  for (PiercedSyncAction &action : m_syncJournal) {
437  action.restore(stream);
438  }
439 }
440 
446 void PiercedSyncMaster::dump(std::ostream &stream) const
447 {
448  std::size_t journalSize = m_syncJournal.size();
449  utils::binary::write(stream, journalSize);
450  for (const PiercedSyncAction &action : m_syncJournal) {
451  action.dump(stream);
452  }
453 }
454 
455 }
